titles.title: Providing for the hour of meeting of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/15/2008--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.) Sets the daily hour of meeting of the 110th Congress until Monday, May 12, 2008, at: (1) 2 p.m. on Mondays; (2) 12 noon on Tuesdays; and (3) 10 a.m. on all other days of the week. Sets the daily hour of meeting from Monday, May 12, 2008, until the end of the 110th Congress at: (1) 12 noon on Mondays; (2) 10 a.m. on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays; and (3) 9 a.m. on all other days of the week.
